item.title: ğŸ’¬â—ï¸Notifications
item.description: Windows Toast notifications on Windows 10: C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\Notifications contains wpndatabase.db and appdb.dat. Both can be opened with ğŸ› SQLite Browser.

item.title: ğŸ—£ Voice Assistants
item.description: Windows Cortana is a great source of information. C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.Windows.Cortana_xxxx\LocalState\ESEDatabase_CortanaCoreInstance\CortanaCoreDb.db contains user locations, reminders etc. Use a ğŸ› SQLite browser to see the contents, or export to cvs and work in Excel.
